name: Jewel Blitz (Watch & Phone)
description:
Enjoy match-3 game on your Apple Watch or iPhone/iPad:
- Detonate as many gems as you can in 60s.
- Match three or more and create cascades of awesome gems.
- Three rare gems: fire gem, ice gem, light gem with powerful skill.
- 60s to go.
- Compete against friends or the world!

*** GET IT NOW ***
